traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The kiddywidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The kiddywidget makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} by the kiddywidget (escape DC 8).

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4 damage) lightning damage.
